  1. io.netty.channel.epoll

Uses of Package
io.netty.channel.epoll

Packages that use io.netty.channel.epoll
Package
Description
io.netty.channel.epoll
Optimized transport for linux which uses EPOLL Edge-Triggered Mode for maximal performance.
  • Classes in io.netty.channel.epoll used by io.netty.channel.epoll

    EpollEventArray
    This is an internal datastructure which can be directly passed to epoll_wait to reduce the overhead.
    EpollIoOps
    Implementation of IoOps that is used by EpollIoHandler and so for epoll based transports.
    EpollMode
    Deprecated.
    Netty always uses level-triggered mode.

    A socket which provides access Linux native methods.
